brandTone:
1. Tone of voice: Sophisticated, modern, polished, aspirational, confident, timeless, refined, approachable, global, stylish

2. Favorite keywords: timeless, modern, sophistication, style, global, refined, confidence, wardrobe, elevate, effortless, chic, versatile

3. Words to avoid: cheap, outdated, basic, casual, loud, flashy, complicated, unpolished, immature, tacky, cluttered, inconsistent

inspiration.subject_line: Reignite Your Style Journey with Us
inspiration.preheader: Remember the confidence you felt when you first styled with us? Let's bring that back!
inspiration.hero_image_description: A vibrant image of a confident individual wearing a stylish Banana Republic outfit, standing in a bustling cityscape.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been styling with us as much lately. We understand life gets busy, but we're here to help you rediscover the confidence and elegance that comes with our timeless pieces. Let's reignite your style journey together!

first.template: You've achieved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} in style milestones with us.
first.fallback: You've achieved incredible style milestones with us.

second.template: With your current benefits, you could save up to {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: With your current benefits, you could save significantly on your next purchase.

nostalgia.preheader: From your first purchase to now, we've been with you every step of the way.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A nostalgic image of a classic Banana Republic storefront, evoking memories of timeless fashion.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've shared so many style moments together, from your first purchase to your latest favorite outfit. We value the trust you've placed in us and are here to continue providing you with the timeless elegance you deserve.

first.template: Over the years, you've enjoyed {{customer.relationship_value}} in exclusive benefits.
first.fallback: Over the years, you've enjoyed numerous exclusive benefits with us.

second.fallback: Your last purchase was a standout moment in your style journey.

social_proof.subject_line: Join the Community of Style Icons
social_proof.preheader: See how our community is elevating their style game every day.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A lively image of a group of stylish individuals enjoying a social event, all dressed in Banana Republic outfits.
social_proof.first_paragraph: Our community of style icons is growing every day, and we'd love for you to continue being a part of it. Discover how others are elevating their style game and find inspiration for your next look.
